text: Va qavmi u sitoʙon [ʙa qasdi komcui az mehmononi Lut] ʙa [xonai] u hucum ovardand, dar hole ki pes az on [niz] murtakiʙi korhoi ziste mesudand. [Lut]Guft: «Ej qavmi man, inho duxtaroni [ummati] man hastand; [ʙo eson izdivoc kuned]. Onon ʙaroi sumo pokizatarand, pas, az Alloh taolo ʙitarsed va maro dar [muqoʙili] mehmononam sarmsor nakuned. Ojo ʙajni sumo mardi xiradmande nest [ki sumoro az in kor ʙozdorad]»
